Posts.Title: Oncotype. savva savva

Posts.Content: savva wrote: Hello all, The patology results show Node negative, ER/PR positive, HER2 +2, which was sent for FISH test. We are waiting for FISH results and the question is whether to do the Oncotype after receiving FISH results or in parallel to save time. Will appreciate answers, opinions and experience.   Log in to post a reply
